root.name: focused

example.code: if (focused) # or "if (focused == True)" ellipse(25, 25, 50, 50) else: line(0, 0, 100, 100) line(100, 0, 0, 100)

root.description: Confirms if a Processing program is "focused," meaning that it is active and will accept mouse or keyboard input. This variable is "True" if it is focused and "False" if not.
